entry.def: A doorkeeper is a person whose job is to stand at the door of a building such as a hotel and help people who are going in or out.

means.word_mean: 1. an official doorkeeper as in a courtroom or legislative chamber
2. the lowest of the minor Holy Orders in the unreformed Western Church but now suppressed by the Roman Catholic Church
